findings.title: Previous plugin includes `.claude/rules/**` in the planner context pack (stronger default principles enforcement)
findings.value: Ensures action-planner sees repo-specific invariants (architecture rules, security, conventions) and can reflect them in tasks/acceptance criteria.
findings.current_gap: Current `scripts/context/build_context_pack.py` does not include `.claude/rules/**`, so rules are easy to drift and not consistently applied during planning.
findings.recommendation: Port deterministic rules inclusion (at/global + project/*.md) into context pack (and optionally lightweight excerpt into per-task contexts).

findings.title: Previous plugin has a project-local enforcement runner + architecture boundary checker (hexagonal boundaries) that can fail the quality/compliance gates
findings.value: Enforces dependency-direction rules deterministically (python/go/ts import scanning), providing real architecture enforcement beyond docs.
findings.current_gap: Current `install-project-pack` only installs a command-runner enforcement stub (no boundaries checker/config). Enforcement is not easy to configure for architecture.
findings.recommendation: Upgrade project pack to install a structured enforcement runner (mode fail/warn, script checks) plus a portable boundary checker with config file.

findings.title: Previous plugin ships a version bump script that stamps version/updated metadata across scripts/agents/skills/templates
findings.value: Makes upgrades auditable and reduces drift in file headers.
findings.current_gap: Current repo references a version bump script in `CLAUDE.md` but does not ship it.
findings.recommendation: Port a simplified `scripts/dev/add_version_headers.py` and document the bump procedure.

findings.title: Previous plugin treats enforcement evidence as first-class quality/compliance signal
findings.current_gap: Current quality suite only best-effort runs `.claude/at/scripts/run_enforcements.py` and reads `.claude/at/enforcement_report.json` (not session-scoped) with limited semantics.
findings.recommendation: Standardize enforcement runner interface to write session-scoped reports and make the quality gate output actionable.
